===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ほらがい|法螺|tr1=hora|t1=boasting, bragging|貝|tr2=kai|t2=shell, shellfish}}. The ''kai'' changes to ''gai'' due to {{rendaku|ほらがい}}.
